website_summaries.verdict: Very economical mini blinds that are simple to install, but owners get what they pay for – slightly “off” colors, flimsy hardware and easy-to-warp slats.
pros: Easy to install, with extra hardware for different installation configurations
Sturdy top bar that doesn’t need bracing
Filters sunlight well without yellowing too quickly
cons: Color is closer to light lavender than white
Installation hardware and anchor caps seem cheap
Slats are flimsy and can bend and warp easily
Shorter and narrower than stated length and width

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, good quality and function.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, good quality and function. Better than the really cheap blinds that are fragile and turn yellow. They come with plenty of extra hardware to install them in various ways. They are solid enough that I did not have to use the center mount it comes with, but then again they are under 30 inches long. A note, I'm not sure if it's the grayish blue color of the room they are in or the curtains but they seem to have a very soft blue tone to them which looks great! I'll include pictures of them installed...
customer_reviews.author: Wolfgang (Steven)

customer_reviews.title: New Blinds
customer_reviews.text: These arrived today and I'm really glad I made the purchase.I bought two, they fit perfectly and the lighting is brilliant. Made the room look brighter and more spacious. They are white with a (very) slight violet tint but not enough to really notice or to tint the lighting. True to image, not flimsy, and came with everything you need to install (tool kit not included ;)
customer_reviews.author: yanna

customer_reviews.title: Met my needs...
customer_reviews.text: They meet my needs, which is privacy for a garage entry door with windows. I'd hoped that they snap into the brackets that were already mounted on the door (those blinds bit the bullet), but they weren't structured to allow that. So I had to mount them with the mounting brackets provided, which was a simple enough task. No mess, no fuss.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly a "white" that matches white wood trim.
customer_reviews.text: They are like a "blue/violet/gray" white. I even double checked the box thinking I got the wrong color. The brackets that hold them to the window, and a few pieces of plastic trim are more of an expected shade of white. I bought white blinds to go with my plain old white wood trim. Construction of the unit seems good. The installation was straightforward. So I gave them 3 stars. I am planning to put a couple of white curtain panels over them.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C

customer_reviews.title: A Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 blinds for my den windows and popped them right up since I'd had blinds up before and the hardware was still there. They looked OK and I thought they'd be fine. At some point a few weeks later, one of the cats reached over from his perch and two of the slats just simply broke. I know blinds are not cat toys but I've never seen slats just break. Now I'll need to replace them but it will be with something else!
customer_reviews.author: Mom to 4 Ragdolls

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 11 for a rental property. For the price they are unbeatable. All 11 worked as they should and I will continue to purchase for other rental properties. They do have a slight blueish tint but is not unreasonable. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: #Finalwalkthroughhack
customer_reviews.text: My parrot destroyed my blinds. I'm about to move from my rental and I know the landlord will nail me with a bill for new blinds. Not only that, she'll pick $70 blinds! These work great. Brand spanking new like nothing ever happened. Little will she know I swapped the two blinds out for twenty freacking bucks. FYI; in case you feel bad for my land lord, she's been raising rent 200 a year for three years. Each year she said it was the last. 2nd report. Land Lord did not notice I swapped the blinds out! I even had two Bali and two from the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: So-So and installation isn't standard with other shades.
customer_reviews.text: Most blinds you can easily replace in old hardware. These, however, have the slit to insert the "center" support in a different place than any other blind I've used. Had to remove the existing bracket and move it. This means the support isn't in the middle, but around a third of the way over from the right. Will have to see how well it actually supports the shade since it isn't in the middle. They are also a pale lavender. What's up with that? Since they're covered by curtains, I'm hoping it won't be a huge problem.
customer_reviews.author: CuriousCat

customer_reviews.title: These are GRAY, not white!
customer_reviews.text: These are GRAY, not white! The listing image and description are for white blinds. I ordered 2 blinds and received them in gray color. Not happy as I needed them ASAP and there isn't time to return and replace them. Thumb down!
customer_reviews.author: Z.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: These mini blinds were easy to install. My husband just took down the old blinds and used the same wall brackets to install the new blinds. The installation could not have been easier. Also, these new blinds make our kitchen much brighter. These blinds are white where our old blinds were a beige color. The new blinds are also easy to open and close. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For privacy great, for light filtering so so
customer_reviews.text: I guess I don't understand the term light filtering. Although I cannot see the Sun about 90% of the light gets through. When it comes to privacy they are one of the best sets of blinds I have ever seen. They overlap more and come closer together than most.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: They're mini blinds
customer_reviews.text: Nice mini blinds for the price. I needed to replace different ones that broke so I bought two of these in case the color of the new and old ones were different colors. These are more of a brighter white, which is nice, and are easy to clean and adjust the size to meet your window needs.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Good simple blinds
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, nothing fancy. We use blinds and curtains in our main-floor bedroom, so we don't need anything decorative because we don't open the curtains often. My husband broke our last set. These went in easily and do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B

customer_reviews.title: Good buy when too busy to go to store.  Bali Blinds light filtering vinyl style.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper at store but worth getting door to door when busy. This blind set up didn't come with the valance like the others I have. It also is the white which has a slight purple hue to it. I guess my others are all off white or a natural white. At any rate the blinds are fine and I may end up replacing them all with the light filtering version. Just gonna find with top valance which is a definite enhancer.
customer_reviews.author: McMoth

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit, Clean Look
customer_reviews.text: These fit my window great (true to listed size). The hardware was not super cheap like some hardware that comes with online purchased products. These are easy to use and look clean! Just FYI, these are not blackout blinds. I was not expecting them to be, but thought that might be helpful info to someone out there.
customer_reviews.author: KaiNai02

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made, cheap
customer_reviews.text: Really cheap, poorly made. Very think slats, like they could snap if you tried to wipe them clean. Turn rods did not work in either of the blinds we ordered. Shame on Bali to put their product name on this.
customer_reviews.author: CaringConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage! I eagerly awaited delivery of these blinds b/c ...
customer_reviews.text: Garbage! I eagerly awaited delivery of these blinds b/c for whatever reason, it's virtually impossible to find the particular size I needed and I needed these in place by a certain date. They were delivered as promised, I put up the hardware and put up the blinds only to realize they don't open or close. The mechanism inside doesn't work. I took the blinds down, fought with the inside to align all the parts, put them back up, and the pieces pop out of place again. This was the case with all THREE sets that I ordered. Poorly made! Save your money! And save your time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: blinds for dining area
customer_reviews.text: blinds look beautiful up...a little pricey w/shipping but in the long run a good buy
customer_reviews.author: ruthann

customer_reviews.title: Great blinds - Except for the lavender tint
customer_reviews.text: Great blinds, smooth movements, the only issue is the slight lavender color that many others have mentioned, the blinds look great in our garage/laundry room but look funny in some of our warmer colored rooms. If these were a nice neutral tinted white they would be perfect for the price...
customer_reviews.author: AmazonTechGuy

customer_reviews.title: I needed a blind fits nice on window
customer_reviews.text: I needed a blind fits nice on window. But it was defective but kept it. I blin was a darker color that the entire blind set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great blinds! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: These Bali Blinds arrived on time, in substantial packaging that was easy to open.Price was economical and the lowest I could find. They were easy to hang and are still working smoothly. The cords pull easily and the blinds themselves help with dimming light during the day. If I need more mini blinds, I will buy these again. Highly recommend these blinds!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Free

customer_reviews.title: The blind slats have the tensile strength of a potato chip and will snap easily. Recommend these be installed in areas with minimal ...
customer_reviews.text: Basic blind at a reasonable cost. Be advised that while advertised as vinyl construction, these are plastic. The blind slats have the tensile strength of a potato chip and will snap easily. Recommend these be installed in areas with minimal traffic. We put ours in the garage windows where they'll get limited use.
customer_reviews.author: Mobius

customer_reviews.title: These are not a “true” white color
customer_reviews.text: I just received these blinds today. While they are of good quality, the white blinds are not a true white. They have an odd grayish tint to them when, compared to my bright white trim around my windows, look very gray. If you are looking for a bright white blind, these are not the ones for you.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hofstatter

customer_reviews.title: Blind was good, if rather flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Blind was good, if rather flimsy, but I ordered 2 (TWO) and received only ONE. I want the missing blind. How do I get through to you?
customer_reviews.author: ABRAXAS

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great price
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time finding a blind with a cord. I like this kind because they have to shortened. These worked great. They are good blinds and good price. Easy to install and shorten. I will buy more of these when my other ones need replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention- light FILTERING
customer_reviews.text: Attractive window treatment, reasonable quality build. About the average installation. Pay attention to the product description -- light FILTERING - meaning that the window remains pretty bright even when the blinds are closed. This is not a black-out window treatment.
customer_reviews.author: aahann

customer_reviews.title: Nice blinds but they are somewhat shorter (narrower) than indicated ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice blinds but they are somewhat shorter (narrower) than indicated in the advert, and than other blinds that I have of the same stated size. Couldn't use it, and sorry about that, since they appeared to be just what I needed and wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Mai

customer_reviews.title: Off color but great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: The white appears to have a slightly gray/blue tint. I have fluorescent lighting in the room they are in, revealing their true color. Otherwise they function perfectly and were easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Hart

customer_reviews.title: High quality, good price.
customer_reviews.text: My boys are super rough on blinds and break them constantly. I replaced the one in there room with these blinds and they are awesome. The boys haven't even broke off one slat! Easy to install and very sturdy. Great price is a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: These work fine. They aren't workhorses, but I treat them gently and they have a smooth motion. I imagine they would be easy to break, but for the price it's not too painful to have to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: A. Steel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, brightened up my living room......they are very white and very thin! Just needed something inexpensive for now!
customer_reviews.author: mary beth johnson

customer_reviews.title: No privacy
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed. I bought these blinds in April 2016 and they have sagged so much that you can see through them without having to lift a slate. I bought 2 of these and now I have to replace them as they provide little in the way of privacy.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph E. Hyland

customer_reviews.title: If you have pets or young children's do not buy ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have pets or young children's do not buy!! My cat was found struggled in the string. I just so happened to work in the room when he was lifeless hanging from the string, .
customer_reviews.author: skin and borns

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and good window coverage without spending more money
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price for these blinds. Easy install and good window coverage without spending more money. Very good buy especially if you have a cat the likes to destroy blinds.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Blue-ish color didn't work out for me.
customer_reviews.text: These were only okay. I actually sent them back. The white color is so "blue" that they looked really strange. I realize there are many shades of "white" but I think most rooms tend to be painted in whites that are toward the warmer shades over the blue-ish ones. But if you have an ice-cold blue or metallic high tech look going on, you might like these.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Howell

customer_reviews.title: cute blinds
customer_reviews.text: I needed these blinds to keep the light out when we're watching tv. These worked perfectly and were at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Jo

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: They have a slight blueish hue compared to the rest of the blinds in the house. Other than that they are a good match and work well.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan B.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have these blinds hanging in my son's room. They were easy to install and they work smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: *InsertUsernameHere*

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: bilnds do not move - when using the wand cannot open or close the blinds. when i put down at night i have to use something to push the blinds close. very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: marsuki

customer_reviews.title: Work good
customer_reviews.text: Fit in the brackets that were already there so that was good , they haven’t been up long , but they look good
customer_reviews.author: Jenn M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was prompt and directions were easy to follow to shorten them. Love these blinds.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Cook

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHITE!!
customer_reviews.text: If you truly need WHITE blinds you need to pass on these. They are a nasty lavender/grey version of white. They might work for you if you are not putting them on a window with white trim. Ugly does not describe the color accurately.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Carr

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT! EASY TO INSTALL
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRODUCT! EASY TO INSTALL, KEEPS OUT LIGHT, AND VERY EASY TO CLEAN! LOOKS GREAT IN ANY ROOM. I WOULD RECOMMEND IT TO A FRIEND!
customer_reviews.author: Dana J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look great in my bedroom and were easy enough for me to install by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Clean and nice.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my purpose. It came in quickly, and worked as intended. Clean and nice.
customer_reviews.author: summer

customer_reviews.title: Not even close to the size I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 23" blinds. Actual measurements are just over 22". If I wanted 22" blinds I would have ordered 22" blinds. With the brackets installed correctly they slide around very loose. Terrible. Don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: short
customer_reviews.text: I like these blinds except the size width is about 1/2 inch smaller than stated. I put in a filler.I just hope they hold up
customer_reviews.author: nana1212

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Bought three of these last year and they are still working great.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR THE
customer_reviews.text: JUST INSTALLED IN "SUNNY" HALF OF SLIDING DOOR. GREAT FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.author: SPIDER B.

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these blinds (2) for my kitchen windows, for privacy. I knew when I ordered them that they might be lavender/bluish because of other reviewers and they were right. They aren't white, but are labeled as such. When they're up, it's not a big deal unless something bright white is next to them. I choose these over other brands because for $9, you can't beat it. They were fairly easy to install too. Overall, I recommend these. I just ordered 2 more for my office. Eventually we will put quality wood blinds up, but these will do for now.
customer_reviews.author: danakscully64

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement.
customer_reviews.text: No different than other vinyl blinds I've purchased in the past...needed to remove & replace a 10 year old set for my kitchen that had yellowed and grown grungy.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B

customer_reviews.title: Love the durability
customer_reviews.text: They are not paper thin and bendable like so many others. Great blinds.
customer_reviews.author: miamgm

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: My cat chewed the strings off first day but regardless, great product
customer_reviews.author: Evan Plutchok

customer_reviews.title: cheap quality and is not cheap either compared to the ...
customer_reviews.text: cheap quality and is not cheap either compared to the one I got from homedepot. will not buy this particular item again.
customer_reviews.author: Thursday

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Fit
customer_reviews.text: Strange that it didn't fit my window. Not worth returning.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela V

customer_reviews.title: I really really like my blinds
customer_reviews.text: I really really like my blinds !! They fit like suppose to everything looks great that i now need to replace other ones
customer_reviews.author: maryD2

customer_reviews.title: Super super. Arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: Super super. Arrived on time! The color is great! The quality is the best! Easy to install. will order more.
customer_reviews.author: qq

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Blinds
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says. good cheap blind. I would not call these nice blinds though. they are cheap
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: cheap blinds
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says. good cheap blind. I would not call these nice blinds though. they are cheap

customer_reviews.title: Cheap blinds
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says. good cheap blind. I would not call these nice blinds though. they are cheap
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: they're blinds and they look like blinds and do what blinds are supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: they're standard blinds you see in every home. they do what they're supposed to do as long as your fiancé shuts them the right way. they're blinds and they look like blinds and do what blinds are supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: LuAnn Shanahan

customer_reviews.title: Purple tint is right :(
customer_reviews.text: I agree with other reviewers, these blinds have a purple tint. Not white like our other blinds. Will work for now, but will be swapping out for truly white blinds.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly

customer_reviews.title: They look great and I'm very impressed with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery. Simple installation. They look great and I'm very impressed with my purchase! Excellent price and free 2 day shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor810e

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! Easy to Install! and great price, This is where i am sending anyone that needs blinds!!
customer_reviews.author: boss

customer_reviews.title: Good looking blinds
customer_reviews.text: I love these blinds, accidentally ordered an inch too small, but that's my bad lol... They look great, don't look cheap at all.
customer_reviews.author: Princess H.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The color is a little more grey than white and the wand doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Court

customer_reviews.title: Loved these blinds
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and look so nice from the ugly curtains we replaced.
customer_reviews.author: eddie folger

customer_reviews.title: Not WHITE and terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: These blinds are not white and are flimsy/terrible quality. I received blinds in an ugly grey color. I expected much better from Bali.
customer_reviews.author: Monica K.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! I put them in my barn office and they are getting the job done.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The price point is great, quality and ease of installation is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise they worked fine, simple set up
customer_reviews.text: One set of many came broken in half, but otherwise they worked fine, simple set up, good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: david kubala

customer_reviews.title: White with a purple tint?
customer_reviews.text: Blinds had a very slight purple tint, also very poor made - the quality of these are even less than those you might find in walmart or even a dollar store unfortunately. On a better note they did fit.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah T.

customer_reviews.title: Will order more!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I ordered 7 with 3 different sizes. Only one word: Super!
customer_reviews.author: qq

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, easy to install, plenty of support! Good product. White color blocks the blinding sun, but keeps the room bright.
customer_reviews.author: Andy & Nancy

customer_reviews.title: They do the job!
customer_reviews.text: I needed blinds as a privacy measure for my bathroom window. These are a perfect fit and I'm very happy with them. Others have commented on the slight blue-ish tint but it hasn't been an issue for me. Would gladly order more if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Grateful GFree Baker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These binds added the clean, finishing touches, to the room.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Singerline

customer_reviews.title: great coverage that does not totally block the sun
customer_reviews.text: Works well to filter sun in back room. Inexpensive, great coverage that does not totally block the sun. would order again
customer_reviews.author: BGM

customer_reviews.title: Simple setup if you are replacing the same type.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement blinds. It's fits in the existing mounts so the setup was very simple. Plug and play!
customer_reviews.author: TCPTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Not WHITE
customer_reviews.text: Light lavender - not white. I needed white. Returned the first box thinking it was a mistake but the replacement blind was the same color.
customer_reviews.author: SallyP

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two blinds. Both arrived not working. Wand sides were inoperable. Not worth the money. Returning asap
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia E. Ihrig

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: VERY nice blinds for the money. They went up very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Mocarski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: look nice they were great for the replacement shades for the rental we were in.
customer_reviews.author: Delaria

customer_reviews.title: Light purple
customer_reviews.text: They indeed are a light purple. They are terrible with my white trimmed windows. YUCH.....they say they are white...what the heck.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are awesone for the price. They keep out the glare from the sun but still allow the room to be naturally lit.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gooding

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Blinds were cheaply made. Can't expect much for the price you're getting them at. The size was off and didn't fit like they should have. Returned them the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Good value and easy to install. They work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. They do the job and provide a classier look to the room
customer_reviews.author: HT

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are working out great. They do an awesome job blocking out the light, so we are sleeping better when the sun used to shine in. They were exactly what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Erin C

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color and head wouldn't fit properly in holders
customer_reviews.text: The box says White but these are NOT white. They are slightly purplish, and it stands out when you put them on a window with white trim. Also, I could not get the top bar to fit in the holders without hanging out about 1/4-1/2 inch--not even close to enough room to put the covers on the holders. I've never had this problem with blinds before. So the color is wrong and even if I wanted to use them anyway, I can't because the parts don't fit together properly. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: These blinds are great! They are lightweight, bright white, well made, and best of all for me, no noxious vinyl smell! My only complaint is the sizes available. 36" was perfect for my regular sized windows. But for the bathroom window, which is small, could not find a size to fit. Had to order the 23" and pack the brackets with filler to make it fit. The slats cover the window ok, but if they had been 2" wider overall, then the top bar would have fit the hanging brackets better.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Light filtering is not a total blind. It lets more light in than a normal blind.
customer_reviews.author: blackcatt69

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were installed easily. They turn easily, and are easy to raise up or down.
customer_reviews.author: Karen R.

customer_reviews.title: i am disappointed that it did not come with a slat to ...
customer_reviews.text: i am disappointed that it did not come with a slat to cover the top mechanism like most blinds have
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One set of Blinds came with broken ends and would ...
customer_reviews.text: One set of Blinds came with broken ends and would not open or close. I should return them but went to Home Depot and got new ends....

customer_reviews.title: product is lavender NOT WHITE as described had to send ...
customer_reviews.text: product is lavender NOT WHITE as described had to send back for refund and get installer to come with a purchased replacement
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: No better quality than the $3 ones I had put up ...
customer_reviews.text: No better quality than the $3 ones I had put up temporarily. Very disappointed. It is more a dingy grey than white
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So easy to replace my old blinds with these! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered three one was not in its own box, it was cracked and the mounting pieces are missing. Not happy with finding it that way.
customer_reviews.author: Nolita

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All is as it should be, lets in the light too.
customer_reviews.author: JohnFord

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does the job and provides plenty of light through the blinds.
customer_reviews.author: Zack M.

product_meta.title: Bali Blinds 76-7500-04 1" Light Filtering Vinyl Corded, 34x64", White
product_meta.description: Size:34x64"Enhance your space with Bali 1" Light Filtering Vinyl Blinds. This basic option provides privacy and gently filters the light entering your home or office. Wand tilt and cord lift controls allow for easy adjustments. Bali 1" Light Filtering Vinyl Blinds are available in different sizes to best fit your windows. These lightweight blinds are durable, easy to install, and easy to clean. This product complies with Consumer Product Safety Commission (CPSC) child safety guidelines.
feature_bullets: White light-filtering slats provide privacy while gently adjusting the light coming into your home
Slats are durable and moisture resistant, perfect for high-humidity, high-traffic areas like kitchens and bathrooms
Can be mounted inside or outside the window opening, and all brackets, hardware, and installation instructions are included
Actual width is 1/2" shorter than the stated width to allow for inside mounting
Can be shortened to desired length quickly and easily
